title: Stability Equation and Two-Component Eigenmode for Domain Walls in a Scalar Potential Model
abstract: Supersymmetric Quantum Mechanics involving two-component eigenfunctions is applied to the stability equation associated with two classical configurations. The issue of stability is studied by introducing an operator technique for the Bogomol'nyi-Prasad-Sommerfield (BPS) on two domain walls in a scalar potential model with minimal $N=1-$supersymmetry.
